messages.message:
Hi team, just wanted to share a quick update on RMQHA project.
We have got RMQHA deployment running in Dogfood cluster for sometime now. And we will be migrating all clients(services that produce and consume to/from RMQ) on this new service. The non-HA RMQ is not removed yet, in case we need to rollback. We will give the new service some bake time in dogfood. Feel free to ask if you got any questions. cc: @sudeep @Sabyasachi Roy
Here is the design doc (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1z8Hhr_aqSxIEImnfvJaQh8aNeMpjEPpAl_2taWvflPA/edit#heading=h.8mhds8l18gdi) in case you want to deep dive in lease based HA of RMQ
This was rolled out. Feel free to ping for any issues. cc: <!subteam^S02FJA6A7U5>
